basics.label: Acting Finance Manager
basics.summary: Innovative Accountant proficient in extracting financial data from various reporting systems and suggesting key operational changes.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Working as Chief Accountant and reporting to General Manager, responsibilities included financial reporting, analysis, budgeting, control measures etc.
highlights: Reduced cost by 400K USD over period of 2 years.
Won contract worth USD 500 Mn contract from ARAMCO, in 2014.
Developed internal reports to control operating cost.
Brought receivables down from 120 to 65 days.
Implemented inventory management in ERP-Oracle Financials 12i
Determined basis for allocation of overhead cost to various cost centers

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Worked as an accountant, reporting to General Manager, with responsibilities including daily sales report generation, cash deposit details reconciliation etc.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Coordinated and managed flow of materials into, through and out of the manufacturing process. Solved inventory issues, prepared forecasts and adopted cost reduction strategies.

education.institution: Kelley School of Business, Indiana University
